name: PRIMITIVE! rock, paper, scissors
description:
ITS GOT EVERYTHING! rocks,  papers, scissors, blurry art what more could you wish for!

made by primitive ape, hence the name PRIMITIVE rock, paper, scissors

CONTROLS

move the red arrow with the the left and right arrow keys and when the arrow is over the selected action, click the down arrow key to select.

5 WINS TO WIN

3 LOSSES AND YOURE OUT
